title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even if dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, the user should still be able to create a new table group. However, currently, the group dialog does not appear if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog does not appear.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog should appear, allowing the user to define the group.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the data set.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Observe that the group dialog does not appear.
